string.text:
Trade in the Zone is conducted mainly by means of electronic transactions for safety and managing risks. But many stalkers keep at least a few banknotes in their pockets in case they want to buy smaller things like cigarettes. This makes life easier and conserves battery life.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] cash
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
